item.title: Child Sexual Exploitation
item.description: A recent case serves as a reminder of the threat posed by pedophiles online.
item.author: fbi

item.title: Incidents of Ransomware on the Rise
item.description: FBI offers tips to protect yourself and your organization from this growing threat.

item.title: Sextortion and Cyberstalking
item.description: One tip uncovered an international scheme by a State Department employee.

item.title: Iranians Charged with Hacking U.S. Financial Sector
item.description: Seven Iranians working on behalf of Iranian government indicted on hacking charges.
item.author: fbi

item.title: Two From ‘Syrian Electronic Army’ Added to Cyber’s Most Wanted
item.description: Three members of a Syrian hacker collective were charged for intrusions into U.S. websites.
item.author: fbi

item.title: Lottery Fraud
item.description: Jamaican ringleader of phone scam that targeted elderly victims in the U.S. sentenced to prison.
item.author: fbi

item.title: National Cyber Security Awareness Month
item.description: Each October, we’re reminded that securing cyberspace is a shared responsibility.
item.author: fbi

item.title: Business E-Mail Compromise
item.description: A sophisticated scam is costing companies worldwide millions of dollars.
item.author: fbi

item.title: Cyber Criminal Forum Taken Down
item.description: Spanning 20 countries, Operation Shrouded Horizon has dismantled an online criminal forum.
item.author: fbi

item.title: FBI Safe Online Surfing Internet Challenge
item.description: Our Safe Online Surfing Internet Challenge just wrapped up its third year with record results.
item.author: fbi

item.title: The Cyber Action Team
item.description: Group of rapid deployment cyber experts respond to major computer intrusions.
item.author: fbi

item.title: Ransomware on the Rise
item.description: The malware’s use is increasing, but the FBI and partners are working to combat this cyber threat.

item.title: FBI Seeking Tech Experts to Become Cyber Special Agents
item.description: The FBI is recruiting the best technical talent to join the ranks of cyber special agents.

item.title: Cyber Crime: Purchase Order Scam Leaves a Trail of Victims
item.description: African cyber criminals have devised a scheme that has cost U.S. retailers millions.

item.title: Cyber Security: Task Force Takes ‘Whole Government’ Approach
item.description: A look at how the National Cyber Investigative Joint Task Force confronts the cyber threat.
